categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: A Human male Imperial Intelligence agent once caught the Ho'Din Spero in possession of a datacard belonging to undercover Rebel Alliance operatives while at the Alderaan consulate on the planet Coruscant shortly before the Battle of Yavin. The agent attempted to arrest Spero, who resisted and fled into hiding with assistance from Princess Leia Organa.
